-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Type-level booleans via type-families
--   
--   Type-level booleans with basic operators that short-circuit as much as
--   possible.
@package type-booleans
@version 0.1


-- | Type-level booleans with very basic operations.
module Type.Booleans
data True
data False
type Nand b1 b2 = Not (And b1 b2)
type Nor b1 b2 = Not (Or b1 b2)
